name: interionic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between ions (= atoms or small groups of atoms that have an electrical charge): interionic spacing The interionic distance depends on the lattice structure. Related word
ion
More examplesFewer examplesThe average interionic spacing is comparable to the orbital spatial extent.The interionic distance for an ionic compound determines the extent of attraction between the cation and anion.The researchers evaluated lattice energies from the interionic distances for certain semiconducting compounds.Based on the interionic distance, fluoride could have a slightly higher melting point than calcium oxide.
